a-na LUGAL be-li₂-a ARAD-ka {1}x x x x lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-a ina UGU {LU₂}ha-ta-a.a ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a at-ta ta-sap-ra ma-a ša-za-bu-sa-te pa-ni-a-te ša {ŠE}tab-ku x+x x x x u₂-sa-ša-ni-u₂ ar-x x x x ša ina pa-ni-šu₂-nu al-du-x x x a-sa-al-šu₂ nu-ku a-ta-a x x x pa-ni-a-te e-ku-lu x+x x x x ša a-na LUGAL be-li₂-a x x x pi-i-ša-nu-u₂-ni x x x x a-sap-ra x x x x x x x x x x {GIŠ}BAN₂ x+x x x x x x x x x ni x x x x x x x x
